com.steffbeard.totalwar.utils.db

Class ConnectionPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.steffbeard.totalwar.utils.db.ConnectionPool

  • public class ConnectionPool
extends Object
    Handy Connection Pool / Database wrapper for use by all plugins.
    Author:
    ProgrammerDan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectionPool(Logger log, String user, String pass, String host, int port, String database, int poolSize, long connectionTimeout, long idleTimeout, long maxLifetime)
      Creates the Database connection pool backed by HikariCP.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void available()
      Quick test; either ends or throws an exception if data source isn't configured.
      void close()
      Closes all connections and this connection pool.
      Connection getConnection()
      Gets a single connection from the pool for use.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionPool

        public ConnectionPool(Logger log,
                      String user,
                      String pass,
                      String host,
                      int port,
                      String database,
                      int poolSize,
                      long connectionTimeout,
                      long idleTimeout,
                      long maxLifetime)
        Creates the Database connection pool backed by HikariCP.
        Parameters:
        log - The logger to use
        user - The user to connection as
        pass - The password to use
        host - The host to connect to
        port - The port on the host to connect to
        database - The database to use
        poolSize - The maximum size of the connection pool (< 10 recommended)
        connectionTimeout - The longest a query can run until timeout occurs (1-5s recommended)
        idleTimeout - The longest a connection can sit idle before recycling (10min recom. check dbms config)
        maxLifetime - The absolute longest length of time a connection can exist (2hr recom. check dbms config)

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public Connection getConnection()
                         throws SQLException
        Gets a single connection from the pool for use. Checks for null database first.
        Returns:
        A new Connection
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • close

        public void close()
           throws SQLException
        Closes all connections and this connection pool.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • available

        public void available()
               throws SQLException
        Quick test; either ends or throws an exception if data source isn't configured.
        Throws:
        SQLException
